com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system

Class DefaultActionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system.DefaultActionProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IActionProvider

    public class DefaultActionProvider
extends Object
implements IActionProvider
    A default implementation of the IActionProvider interface used in combination with the action layer. This class provides a convenient way to register actions for a given timeline object type.
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    ActionLayer.setActionProvider(IActionProvider)

    • Method Detail

      • getTimelineObjectActions

        public List<Action> getTimelineObjectActions(LayerContainer lc,
                                             TimelineObjectPath path)
        Returns the actions registered for the timeline object specified by the given timeline object path.
        Specified by:
        getTimelineObjectActions in interface IActionProvider
        Parameters:
        lc - the layer container where the action layer is used
        path - the path to the timeline object
        Returns:
        a list of actions to be displayed in the action layer
        Since:
        2.1

      • addAction

        public void addAction(Class timelineObjectType,
                      Action... action)
        Adds a new action for the given type of timeline objects.
        Parameters:
        timelineObjectType - the object type
        action - the action to add
        Since:
        2.1

      • setActions

        public void setActions(Class timelineObjectType,
                       List<Action> actions)
        Sets the given list of actions as the available quick actions for timeline objects of the given type. Previously registered actions will be removed.
        Parameters:
        timelineObjectType - the type of timeline objects for which the given actions are available
        actions - the actions to register for the given timeline object
        Since:
        2.1

      • removeAction

        public void removeAction(Class timelineObjectType,
                         Action... action)
        Removes the action for the given timeline object type.
        Parameters:
        timelineObjectType - the object type
        action - the action to remove
        Since:
        2.1
